imp.comment: Force break; vector at $FFFE; sets I
Return from interrupt; pull P then PC

imm.comment: ARR: AND imm, then ROR A; V from bit6^bit5

0x00.comment: Force break; vector at $FFFE; sets I

0x40.comment: Return from interrupt; pull P then PC

0x6B.comment: ARR: AND imm, then ROR A; V from bit6^bit5
